presets.name: Chug Crusher
presets.summary: Aggressive, tight chug tone with boosted mids and layered harmonics. Perfect for palm-muted riffs and articulate solos.

presets.name: Modern Djent Architect
presets.summary: Punchy, percussive high-gain tone with surgical EQ and modern djent characteristics. Designed for complex rhythms and tight low end.
